column4: I cant get vista to install on a partition... has anyone installed after they setup ubuntu?
Has anyone installed vista after Ubuntu?!?!?!
nope, vista overwrites the bootloader and pretty much screws you/grub,  i would avoid that like the plague
When i boot into the vista installer and try to select the drive i want to install to, it gives me the error "Windows is unable to find a system volume that meets its criteria for installation"
